net.truelicense.api.passwd.PasswordProtection

    net.truelicense.api

    net.truelicense.api.crypto
    Provides encryption services.
    net.truelicense.api.passwd
    Provides password management.

    • Uses of PasswordProtection in net.truelicense.api

      Methods in net.truelicense.api with parameters of type PasswordProtection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.keyProtection(PasswordProtection keyProtection)
      Sets the password protection which is used for accessing the private key in the key entry (optional).
      EncryptionInjection<Target> EncryptionInjection.protection(PasswordProtection protection)
      Sets the password protection which is used for generating a secret key for encryption/decryption.
      AuthenticationInjection<Target> AuthenticationInjection.storeProtection(PasswordProtection storeProtection)
      Sets the password protection which is used for verifying the integrity of the key store.

    • Uses of PasswordProtection in net.truelicense.api.auth

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PasswordProtection AuthenticationParameters.keyProtection()
      Returns a password protection for accessing the private key in the key entry.
      PasswordProtection AuthenticationParameters.storeProtection()
      Returns a password protection for verifying the integrity of the key store.

    • Uses of PasswordProtection in net.truelicense.api.crypto

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PasswordProtection EncryptionParameters.protection()
      Returns a password protection for generating the secret key for encryption/decryption.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
